SEARCH
Package org.opengis.referencing.crs

Interface GeodeticCRS

All Superinterfaces:
CoordinateReferenceSystem, IdentifiedObject, ReferenceSystem, SingleCRS
All Known Subinterfaces:
GeocentricCRS, GeographicCRS
@UML(identifier="SC_GeodeticCRS", specification=ISO_19111) public interface GeodeticCRS extends SingleCRS
A 2- or 3-dimensional coordinate reference system associated with a geodetic datum. Geodetic CRSs provide an accurate representation of the geometry of geographic features for a large portion of the Earth's surface.

This type of CRS can be used with coordinate systems of type CartesianCS, SphericalCS or EllipsoidalCS.

Since:
2.1
